name: SLICRX
description:
Game made for Mini Jam #97

PS: YOU DON'T  LOSE POINTS IF YOU HIT 2 OR  MORE BALLS

Controls: Arrows up/down = volume up/down,  x:  attack, c: skill

Where does  the theme simulation fit in?  the game takes place  in a a training room for hyper light speed battle simulation for high skilled ninjas.

My idea for the limitation "Movement is lethal"  is that the player has to dash through enemies to slice them, and he can't stop moving and have to dodge moving squares

It doesn't fit Simulation very well but it does fit with "movement is lethal"

If the web build isn't working or has bugs, use the Windows version,  for other plataforms you'll need LÖVE
